Description: A high-precision wireless mouse with ergonomic design.
A durable mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting.
A multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader.
Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation.

An adjustable tablet stand for comfortable viewing angles.
A reliable external hard drive with 2TB storage capacity.
